titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude payments received under the Work Colleges Program from gross income, including payments made from institutional funds.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/25/2014--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income payments received by a student under a comprehensive work-learning-service program operated by a work college.
